channel.title: CVE Feed for Unified Intents AB -- Unified Remote
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unified Intents AB -- Unified Remote

item.title: CVE-2022-3229|2024-08-03T01:00:10.637Z -- unified%20intents%20ab -- unified%20remote
item.description: Because the web management interface for Unified Intents' Unified Remote solution does not itself require authentication, a remote, unauthenticated attacker can change or disable authentication requirements for the Unified Remote protocol, and leverage this now-unauthenticated access to run code of the attacker's choosing.
